item.title: ComplicitSplat: Downstream Models are Vulnerable to Blackbox Attacks by 3D Gaussian Splat Camouflages
item.description:
Summary

  • Introduces ComplicitSplat, a black-box attack using 3D Gaussian Splatting to create viewpoint-specific camouflage
  • Targets downstream object detectors including single-stage, multi-stage, and transformer-based models
  • Demonstrates success on both real-world and synthetic scenes without model access

Paper Type

  • Research

Additional Information

item.title: IGAff: Benchmarking Adversarial Iterative and Genetic Affine Algorithms on Deep Neural Networks
item.description:
Summary

  • Introduces two new black-box adversarial attack algorithms: Affine Transformation Attack (ATA) and Affine Genetic Attack (AGA)
  • Evaluates performance on ResNet-18, DenseNet-121, Swin Transformer V2, and Vision Transformer models using Tiny ImageNet, Caltech-256, and Food-101 datasets
  • Compares with existing Pixle and Square Attack methods, achieving up to 8.82% accuracy improvement
  • Provides insights into adversarial robustness and defense strategies

Paper Type

  • Research

Additional Information

  • Authors: ['Sebastian-Vasile Echim', 'Andrei-Alexandru Preda', 'Dumitru-Clementin Cercel', 'Florin Pop']
  • Tags: ['adversarial attacks', 'black-box attacks', 'affine transformations', 'genetic algorithms', 'image classification']
